participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Creative, humorous, and a bit laid-back. Enjoys cooking and spending time with family.
participant_1.background:
I have a computer that is small enough for me to use comfortably, and it has all the features I need to design and create my own unique French fry creations.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
my wife stays home with our kids.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
Social media is not my thing.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Active, nurturing, and passionate about reading and education. Loves to motivate others.
participant_2.background:
I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
my mother has 500 pairs of shoes.
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
i am a librarian in my current job.

content.text: Hello! What do you enjoy doing for fun?
Hi there! I like to stay active, go running, and spend time with my family.
My wife stays home with our kids. I used to go running more often, but lately I have been busy with work and my eyes are not the best.
Oh that's too bad! I am a librarian and I try to get my kids to read as much as they can. I also have a big family and spend a lot of time driving them to sports events and other activities.
That's awesome! I have two weaknesses, my eyes and my driving skills, but I am trying to work on both of them.
Oh dear, that must be tough! I have a computer that is small enough for me to use comfortably, and it has all the features I need to design and create my own unique French fry creations.
That's really cool! I love French fries! I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
Haha! That's a good one! I am glad that you were able to get away with it.
Thanks! How are you enjoying the weather today?
It's a beautiful day! I am looking forward to going for a run later this afternoon.
That's great! I hope you have a good run
